record.field: GST amounts you owe the Tax Office from sales
GST amounts the Tax Office owes you from purchases
G6: Total sales subject to GST (G1 minus G5)
G8: Total sales subject to GST after adjustments (G6 + G7)
G9: GST on sales (G8 divided by eleven)
G13: Purchases for making input taxed sales
G14: Purchases without GST in the price
G15: Estimated purchases for private use or not income tax deductible
G17: Total purchases subject to GST (G12 minus G16)
G19: Total purchases subject to GST after adjustments (G17 + G18)
GST on purchases (G19 divided by eleven)
W1: Total salaries, wages and other payments
W4: Amounts withheld where no ABN is quoted
W3: Other amounts withheld (not shown at W2 or W4)
W5: Total amounts withheld (W2 + W4 + W3)
T8: Estimated tax for the year
T9: Varied amount payable for the Quater
F1: Fringe Benefits Tax Instalment amount
F2: Estimated FBT for the year
F3: Varied amount payable for the Quarter
7C: Fuel tax credit over claim (Do not claim in litres)
5B: Credit from PAYG income tax instalment variation
7D: Fuel tax credit (Do not claim in litres)
